attributes.action: AGAINST Killing people, Who Kill People, To Show Killings Not Right
attributes.additional_details:
Help Abolish Death Penalty. Killing people, Who Kill People, To Show Killings Not Right.

Wouldn't that be a never ending cycle, what makes it fair for foreign goverment to kill, to show killings not right.

PUT A STOP TO THE DEATH PENALTY !!!

"An eye for an eye makes the whole world blind"
Gandhi
